faqs.question: What is Lorem Ipsum?
faqs.answer: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

faqs.question: Why do we use it?
faqs.answer: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

faqs.question: Where does it come from?
faqs.answer: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.

faqs.question: Is it safe to use Lorem Ipsum?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lorem Ipsum is safe to use. It has been used as the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s.
